allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add Phase 2 features: payments, messaging, groups, reviews, and more

- Listings: create, edit, view, and manage property listings
- Messages: real-time messaging between users
- Groups: roommate groups with invitations and expense sharing
- Payments: Stripe integration for payments and Connect onboarding
- Reviews: user review system with ratings
- Verification: phone and ID verification via Twilio and Certn
- Saved listings: bookmark favorite properties
- Settings: user preferences and payment settings
- Landing page: marketing components for homepage
- API routes: comprehensive REST API for all features
- Database migrations: Phase 2 schema updates

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Improve upload error handling and add API route config

- Add runtime and dynamic config to upload route
- Better error handling to show actual server response

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
Bash(git -C "C:\\Users\\computer\\Downloads\\nestmatch-app" commit -m "chore\(db\): add Phase 3 scheduling migration")
